snippet: With Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg's State of the City Address scheduled for Thursday, City Room is asking readers to provide a local perspective.
abstract: With Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg's State of the City Address scheduled for Thursday, City Room is asking readers to provide a local perspective.
lead_paragraph: Thursday at 1 p.m., Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg will give his annual State of the City Address. He can be expected to tout the year's successes and promote his administration's policies and plans going forward. City Room will cover it live with a video feed and tweets from our reporters and editors.

headline.main: What Is the State of Your Block?
